title: Is This Patriots Panic Different Than Before? Plus, the 49ers vs. Lamar, the Embarrassing Eagles, and More Week 13 Reactions | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
After a loss to the Texans, is it finally time to worry about the Patriots? We also discuss where the Texans sit among AFC contenders after Sunday night’s win (2:00). Then, we give our takeaways from the Ravens-49ers game before getting to Stock Up, led by the sneaky Bills and surging Titans, (23:15) and Stock Down, led by the Eagles. Finally, we throw challenge flags on the NFC East and predict tomorrow’s headlines (45:50).
Hosts: Robert Mays and Kevin Clark

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
